Columns.Name: 工事見積_見積手配待ち件数
工事見積_見積手配保留件数
工事見積_設計待ち件数
工事見積_見積催促中件数
工事見積_設計審査中件数
工事見積_修正依頼中件数
工事見積_審査保留件数
工事見積_審査完了件数
工事見積_受注確定待ち件数

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select sum((case when (`c`.`estimate_arrange_wait_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_見積手配待ち件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`estimate_arrange_pending_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_見積手配保留件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`design_wait_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_設計待ち件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`estimate_reminder_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_見積催促中件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`design_examination_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_設計審査中件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`requesting_correction_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_修正依頼中件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`pending_review_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_審査保留件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`examination_complete_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_審査完了件数`,sum((case when (`c`.`order_wait_flg` = 1) then 1 else 0 end)) AS `工事見積_受注確定待ち件数` from ((`t_object_construction_estimate` `a` left join `t_object_order` `b` on((`a`.`object_order_id` = `b`.`object_order_id`))) left join `m_construction_estimate_status` `c` on((`a`.`construction_estimate_status_id` = `c`.`construction_estimate_status_id`))) where ((`b`.`active_flg` = 1) and ((`c`.`estimate_arrange_wait_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`estimate_arrange_pending_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`design_wait_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`estimate_reminder_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`design_examination_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`requesting_correction_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`pending_review_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`examination_complete_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`order_wait_flg` = 1)))
